name: Jumping Candy
description:
Arcade games is probably the most common theme when it comes to make arcade jumping games. itch.io App Store is full of arcade jumping games but it's still hard to find a good free jumping game for Android to live the real adventure with it, Isn't it string!

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "Jumping Candy", so be ready for a jumpy game experience. Jump games has a classic in arcade jumping game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free jumping adventure. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play Jumping Candy:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the screen to jump, and try to avoid candy bombs and thorns. That's all.

Feature of Jumping Candy:

  • Amazing and clean graphics
  • Simple and user friendly controls
  • Clean and hight quality sounds
  • Optimized for all Android devices including tabs

    • So are you ready to hit the game and live the adventure?

    It's a perfect and a must have this jumping game if you are bored with playing regular jumping games. Just download Jumping Candy and start your own adventure. Have fun !

    Don't forget to leave us rating and review to let us know what you think about Jumping Candy. We always want to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun jumping games for your Android. Your feedback plays an important role to be able to achieve this goal.
